description: Faraday Future held a successful FX Super One Co-Creation and Sales Event in Seattle, attracting professionals from major tech companies. The event is part of a U.S. tour, with plans for future events in multiple states and a Middle East launch in Q4 2025.

title: Why Is Palantir Stock Soaring, and Is It Too Late to Buy?
description: Palantir Technologies has recently signed significant deals with Boeing and the U.K., potentially boosting its growth rates. However, the company may face challenges from a new AI competitor entering the national security market.
